<style>
:root{
  --header-h:15mm; --footer-h:10mm;
  --page-width:210mm; --page-height:297mm;
  --muted:#6b7280; --accent:#2e7db8;
}
*{ box-sizing:border-box; }
html, body{ margin:0; padding:0; background:#fff; }
body{ font-family: Inter, system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color:#111; }
.page{ width:var(--page-width); height:var(--page-height); position:relative; background:#fff; page-break-after:always; }
.page:last-child{ page-break-after:auto; }
.hdr{ height:var(--header-h); padding:6px 10mm; display:flex; align-items:center; gap:10px; border-bottom:1px solid #e5e7eb; background:linear-gradient(90deg,#f5f7ff,#fff); }
.hdr svg{ height:calc(var(--header-h) - 8px); width:auto; }
.ftr{ height:var(--footer-h); border-top:1px solid #e5e7eb; display:flex; align-items:center; justify-content:space-between; padding:0 10mm; color:var(--muted); font-size:11px; }
.body{ position:absolute; top:var(--header-h); bottom:var(--footer-h); left:0; right:0; padding:10mm; overflow:hidden; }
.flow > * { break-inside: avoid; }
h1{ font-size:22px; margin:0 0 6px 0; letter-spacing:.02em; }
h2{ font-size:18px; margin:10px 0 6px 0; }
p{ line-height:1.45; margin:0 0 6px 0; }
.table{ width:100%; border-collapse:collapse; font-size:13px; margin:6px 0; }
.table th, .table td{ border:1px solid #e5e7eb; padding:6px 8px; vertical-align:top; }
.table thead th{ background:#f7f9ff; }
.kv th{ background:#f7f9ff; width:38%; text-align:left; }
.kv td{ width:62%; }
.badge{ display:inline-block; background:var(--accent); color:#fff; padding:.2rem .5rem; border-radius:999px; font-size:12px; }
.note{ color:#6b7280; font-size:12px; }
.forcePageEnd{ page-break-after:always; break-after:page; height:1px; background:transparent; }
.receipt{border:1px solid #bcd2f0; padding:10px; border-radius:8px; background:#fff;} .thankyou{text-align:center; font-size:20px; color:var(--accent);} hr{border:none; height:1px; background:#dbe6f7;}
@page{ size:210mm 297mm; margin:0; }
</style>

scripts.content:
<script>
window.addEventListener('load', () => {
  const BUFFER = 2;
  function ensureFlow(page){
    const body = page.querySelector('.body');
    let flow = body.querySelector(':scope > .flow');
    if(!flow){
      flow = document.createElement('div');
      flow.className = 'flow';
      const kids = Array.from(body.childNodes);
      body.innerHTML='';
      kids.forEach(k => flow.appendChild(k));
      body.appendChild(flow);
    }
    return { body, flow };
  }
  function makePageAfter(prevPage){
    const clone = prevPage.cloneNode(true);
    const cBody = clone.querySelector('.body');
    cBody.innerHTML='';
    const cFlow = document.createElement('div');
    cFlow.className = 'flow';
    cBody.appendChild(cFlow);
    prevPage.parentNode.insertBefore(clone, prevPage.nextSibling);
    return { page: clone, body: cBody, flow: cFlow };
  }
  function paginate(page){
    const { body, flow } = ensureFlow(page);
    const items = Array.from(flow.children);
    flow.innerHTML='';
    let cur = { page, body, flow };
    for(const el of items){
      if(el.classList && el.classList.contains('forcePageEnd')){
        if(cur.flow.childElementCount > 0){ cur = makePageAfter(cur.page); }
        continue;
      }
      cur.flow.appendChild(el);
      const elBottom = el.getBoundingClientRect().bottom;
      const bodyBottom = cur.body.getBoundingClientRect().bottom;
      if(elBottom > bodyBottom - BUFFER){
        cur.flow.removeChild(el);
        const next = makePageAfter(cur.page);
        next.flow.appendChild(el);
        cur = next;
      }
    }
  }
  const originals = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.page'));
  originals.forEach(pg => paginate(pg));
  const pages = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.page'));
  const total = pages.length;
  pages.forEach((pg, i) => {
    pg.querySelectorAll('.current').forEach(el => el.textContent = String(i+1));
    pg.querySelectorAll('.total').forEach(el => el.textContent = String(total));
  });
});
</script>
